ask_name: May I have your name, please?
plane_ask_date: On what day do you want the plane to arrive?
plane_request_optional: I can also filter the results for a specific airline, class, price or duration.
plane_inform_flight_details:
Right, I found {clazz:s} flight with {airline:s} for {price:d} credits
 that takes {duration:d} hours to get to {arrival_city:s}.
plane_ask_more_questions: Would you like to search for any more flights?
anything_else: Is there anything else that I can do for you?
out_of_scope: I am sorry, I don't quite understand what you mean. I am only able to help you search for flights.
